title: Palatial 6 Bedroom Luxury Oriental Villa in Koh Samui
description:
Key Features
•	Ultra-luxury 6 bedroom, 7 bathroom villa
•	Unique cedar-wooden pagoda roof-design
•	Located in the peaceful Laem Sor hillside
•	Fully furnished to an exceptional level
•	Built-in-conditioning & ceiling fans
•	Huge Infinity-edge private pool
•	Expansive terrace area & Jacuzzi
•	En-suite bathrooms & bathtub
•	Luxury white designer kitchen
•	Fully equipped: gas hob & oven
•	Large breakfast bar/island area
•	Outdoor covered kitchen area
•	Oversize wooden vaulted ceilings
•	Designer fitted kitchen
•	Breakfast bar/island area
•	Western-style kitchen
•	Large landscaped gardens
•	Mature trees & boulders
•	Private covered parking
•	Freehold Chanote
